name: 4th Global Summit on Climate Change
content: On behalf of Climate Congress 2019 (Climate Change Conferences) Organizing Committee, we are pleased to invite academics, counsellors, educators, environmentalist, policy makers, research scientists, self-help group facilitators, teachers, business delegates and Young researchers across the world to attend Global Summit on Climate Change which is to be held on September 16-17, 2019 at Seoul, South Korea. The conference highlights the theme “An Insider's View of Climate Science for a Sustainable Future”.
